message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper focuses on segmenting objects in images based on natural language descriptions, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a comprehension network that uses language and visual encoders, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper introduces a caption generation network, which could fall under cs.LG (Learning). The use of dynamic filters and the transfer of knowledge from text to image could also suggest a connection to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the evaluation of the proposed framework on referring expression datasets could indicate a connection to cs.MM (Multimedia).
